Text: Daylight Savings TimeDear Church Family Its time to fall back Daylight Savings Time will go into effect Sunday October th at AM Remember to turn your clock back hour before going to bed Saturday night and enjoy an extra hour of sleep We look forward to seeing each of you in Worship and Bible Study this weekend Second Baptist Church Staff wwwsecondorg

Keith Here are a few opportunities to celebrate Thanksgiving with the Second Baptist family and make the holiday brighter for those less fortunate in our community Thanksgiving Services Its a Time to Give Thanks Join the Second Baptist Family as we celebrate Thanksgiving with a special worship service filled with music testimonies and a tribute to some of our hometown heroes Plan to attend one of these special services West Campus Sunday November th at pm Woodway Campus Tuesday November th at pm Angels of Light This is the final weekend Saturday and Sunday November th th to bring your nonperishable food wrapped toys or used clothing for Angels of Light Dont miss this opportunity to make the holiday season a little brighter for someone special Donations may be dropped off at either campus of Second Baptist Church For more information about Second Baptist Church visit our website at wwwsecondorg

SingleLife Christmas PartyHow will hundreds of Houstons young singles celebrate Christmas this holiday season The SingleLife Christmas Party on Thursday December th from pm Midnight will be the social event of the season Single adults ages are invited to enjoy the festivities as the Aerial Theatre in downtown Houston is filled with tinsel and cheer for this annual semiformal event Hors de oeuvres music merry people and incredible door prizes promise to make this party a smash hit Tickets are now available for only until Decst until Decth and for at the door Get yours today at wwwsinglelifeorg Dont just settle for another boring office holiday party go where there is life
